Meso.station_list()¶

class MesoPy.Meso(api_token)¶
station_list(**kwargs)¶

Returns in JSON format a list of stations (and metadata)that corresponds to user-specified parameters.

Args: The user may pass in any of the below parameters as string arguments

state: US state, 2-letter ID e.g. state=CO county: County/parish/borough (US/Canada only), full name e.g. county=Larimer radius: Distance from a lat/lon pt as [lat,lon,radius (mi)] e.g. radius=-120,40,20 bbox: Stations within a [lon/lat] box in the order [lonmin,latmin,lonmax,latmax] e.g. bbox=-120,40,-119,41 cwa: NWS county warning area (string) e.g. cwa=LOX See http://www.nws.noaa.gov/organization.php for CWA list nwsfirezone: NWS Fire Zone (string) e.g. nwsfirezone=LOX241 gacc: Name of Geographic Area Coordination Center e.g. gacc=EBCC See http://gacc.nifc.gov/ for a list of

GACC abbreviations

subgacc: Name of Sub GACC e.g. subgacc=EB07

Returns:
dictionary of requested stations
